General.Name: Caledonia Investments
General.Description: Caledonia Investments plc is a self-managed investment trust company. It invests in private and public equity markets across the globe. The firm benchmarks the performance of its portfolios against the FTSE All-Share Total Return Index. Caledonia Investments plc was founded in 1928 and is based in London, United Kingdom.
General.Address: Cayzer House, London, United Kingdom, SW1E 6NN
